cleave.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to cut something into separate parts using a heavy tool, or to be able to be cut in this way
cleave.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The wooden door had been cleft in two.
cleave.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to divide something into two completely separate parts
cleave.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the racial problems that still cleave American society
